dmca.title: Self-Storage Site duz.com Claims Infringement (#2)
dmca.body:
duz Internet and websites - for business
duz.com, [private], Ash, Surrey, GU12 6NW. U.K.

Google, Inc. Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
U.S.A.	

2nd April 2004

Digital Millennium Copyright Act - Infringement Notification

1. Identify in sufficient detail the copyrighted work that you believe has been infringed.

The copyrighted work is the text that appears on 
www.self-storage-facilities.com detailed in APPENDIX A attached.

2. Identify the material that you claim is infringing the copyrighted work listed in item# 1 above.

The infringing work is the text that appears on the following page(s) for the following search(s) detailed in APPENDIX B attached.

Search Query: "Self storage as a solution to cluttered personal and business lives"

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.moveus.com/index.cgi/cid1/p=self_storage.htm

N.B. All pages on this site are SEO cloaked therefore the Google cash, also infringing copyright, is different from the public page and is reproduced in part in APPENDIX C.

3. Provide information reasonably sufficient to permit Google to contact you (email address is preferred).

Email: [private]@duz.com

4. Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the web page that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred).

Email address on website: [private]@allamericanmovers.com Tel: 1-800-xxx-xxxx, 
1-800-xxx-xxxx.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

SIGNED:

[Private]

Tel: xxxxx xxxxxx Fax: +44(0)xxxx xxxxxx Email: [private]@duz.com Web: www.duz.com
